column2: jewelyjul@aol.com, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I took this medication for about a 18 month period. I developed a rare skin condition called Lichen Planus. This caused a severerash and itching on my hands, wrists and feet. I used several prescriptions that provided some relief. Not until about 6-8 weeks after I decided to stop taking Simvastatin, did the rash noticably start to heal. My cholesterol level was lowered by the drug, I just could not stand the rash and itching anymore!
